metadata.title: CVE-2017-10792 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There is a NULL Pointer Dereference in the function ll_insert() of the libpspp library in GNU PSPP before 0.11.0. For example, a crash was observed within the library code when attempting to convert invalid SPSS data into CSV format. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: pspp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1').
